author: Sam-Harper
body:
Dear All,

This is the backport of #25671 which is needed to fix a bug in reading the pf cluster isolation for pre-102X produced eles/phos in 102X+. Up to you if you want it for 103X, I would say so otherwise it would be surprising that it works for 102X and 105X but not 103X and 104X

Best,
Sam
title: Adding IO rules to set PF cluster isolation in Ele/Phos: 103X
